name: Subterranean Golf
description:
Hit the ball into the hole, it's golf!

Use the mouse to aim the ball, then hold down the left mouse button to charge your shot. Release the button to shoot.

Use keys 1-9 to skip through the levels.

Use 'r' to return to main menu.

All assets are original.

Features attempted:

  • Core Functionality
    • Ball aiming and shooting
    • Ball aiming line
    • Ball sunk
    • Ball reset
    • Ball stopping
  • Extra Functionality
    • Turbo boost
    • Divot particles
    • Trail
    • Post-processing (bloom and vignette)
    • Ball shot sound effect
    • Music
  • User Interface
    • Title screen with level select
    • In-game UI
    • Start of level text
    • End of level text
  • Level 1
  • Level 2
  • Level 3
  • Level 4
  • Level 5
  • Level 6
  • Level 7
  • Level 8
  • Level 9
